Three Names & One Lineage

  • SW Pottery & Jewelry

Zamora Florencio and Jacobita Zamora, inhabiting the property in the late 1800's, begat two daughters, Maria and Margaret. Maria married Herman Chavez and begat Florencio Leopold Chavez. Florencio married Agatha Quintana and are the parents of Eileen Chavez-Maestas and Tito D. Chavez.
Chavez Today, the Chavez name bears the name of the four-term New Mexico State Senator: Tito D. Chavez. Tito and Beatrice Moya-Chavez are the parents of Matthew Chavez.
Maestas Eileen Chavez-Maestas and Eli Maestas are the parents of Victor, Michael, and Thomas.
